column4: sudo make install /home/dustin/Desktop/firefox-1.5.0.1.tar.gz   whats wrong with that?
what is wrong is that you dont have a clue on what you are doing
do not execute a command with sudo specially when you don't understand it
you dont install it, you extract it
it does run, if you know what is to be ran
you cd into the source, and run the binary which starts firefox
